name: filter_vcf_with_bedfile_v1.1
title: filter_vcf_with_bedfile_v1.1
summary: v1.1 - Filters a VCF file using a BED file - keeps variants overlapping/within the region of interest. Runs bcftools v1.13

inputSpec.name: vcf_file
inputSpec.label: Input vcf file
inputSpec.help: The vcf file to be filtered

inputSpec.name: vcf_index
inputSpec.label: Input vcf index file
inputSpec.help: The index file of the vcf file to be filtered

inputSpec.name: bedfile
inputSpec.label: bedfile to filter vcf
inputSpec.help: The bedfile you wish to use to filter the vcf file with

outputSpec.name: filtered_vcf
outputSpec.label: Output vcf
outputSpec.help: A vcf file containing variants from vcf that fall within the regions given in the bed file.
